hero.title: hey, i'm
hero.subtitle: i notice things that could work better, then i build them

proofSnapshot.text: this site is fully custom-built (no templates)

philosophy.title: notice
philosophy.description: i pay attention to friction. when something feels harder than it should, that's a signal.

philosophy.title: build
philosophy.description: ideas don't count until they're real. i ship working code, not concepts.

philosophy.title: iterate
philosophy.description: first version ships. then i learn what actually matters and improve it.
